short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser addon to track and log progress through the course and award points for tasks accomplished.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The DOPE application is a browser extension  that tracks logged-in users progress on specific  learning sites and allocates points to them on completion. The users are able to log into their account on a DOPE platform to view their accumulated points and their current standing on available leaderboards.
